1.0.1.name: wordpress/premise-idevaffiliate-integration
1.0.1.description:
The Premise iDevAffiliate Integration plugin passes the order details and if you activate Optional Variables it will also pass the customer name, email address and the purchased product to iDevAffiliate.

In order to use this plugin you will need to have a copy of Premise and iDevAffiliate.

Read more details about the plugin on the Premise iDevAffiliate Integration site.
